description: BTIDES SDP packet information data types

transaction_id.description: 2-byte "Transaction ID" field from spec. Arbitrary value, just used to match requests to responses.

pdu_id_str.description: This optional field (interpretation of 'pdu_id' field) is just for if you don't care about json file size and you want more human-readable JSON output.

l2cap_len.description: 2-byte length field from the enclosing L2CAP header. Not 100% sure yet whether we should include this in SDP but including it just in case.

l2cap_cid.description: 2-byte Channel ID (CID) field from the enclosing L2CAP header. Not 100% sure yet whether we should include this in SDP but including it just in case.

pdu_id.description: The L2CAP code for this packet type. Must always be 6.

raw_data_hex_str.description: Because the SDP data can be variable-length lists, and because Scapy doesn't parse it currently, for now I'm just saving this as the raw data which I'll put into the DB and then parse with TellMeEverything.py
